summary.para: Called when an interaction is detected.

param.name: viewport
param.para: The viewport on which the interaction was detected.

param.name: interaction
param.para: One of the values from DIRECTMANIPULATION_INTERACTION_TYPE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Defines methods to handle interactions when they are detected. Note When implementing this interface, ensure that the implementation supports multithreading through thread-safe reference counting. For more information, see and .
